a variation on the lucky star bedspread #644 1 published in spool cotton co #122 bedspreads *note * some sources give instructions for the full-sized tablecloth others give instructions for the motif and fill-in lace and suggest various-sized cloths or mats that can be made with them **materials ** size 20 crochet thread j & p coats or clark s brands recommended milward s steel crochet hook no 11 or 12
**gauge and yardage ** one motif measures 4-1/2 inches in diameter main motif requires about 35 yards and fill-in motif requires about 4 yards a tablecloth measuring 72 x 90 inches requires 44 balls of clark s big ball mercerized crochet or approximately 12 340 yards 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lucky-star-bedspread-644
